HotelElement.Name: URH Palacio de Oriol Hotel (Formerly NH Palacio de Oriol)

Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Santurtzi, URH Palacio de Oriol Hotel is close to Vizcaya Bridge and Getxo Aquarium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Abra Getxo Marina and Estadio Nuevo Lasesarre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 88 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

In the heart of Santurtzi, URH Palacio de Oriol Hotel is close to Vizcaya Bridge and Getxo Aquarium. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Abra Getxo Marina and Estadio Nuevo Lasesarre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Vizcaya Bridge - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Getxo Aquarium - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Abra Getxo Marina - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Estadio Nuevo Lasesarre - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Teatro Barakaldo - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Bilbao Exhibition Centre - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Maritime Museum - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
San Mames Stadium - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
University of Deusto Bilbao - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Dona Casilda Iturrizar Park - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Bilbao Fine Arts Museum - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Guggenheim Museum Bilbao - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Chavarri Palace - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Plaza Moyua - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi

The preferred airport for URH Palacio de Oriol Hotel is Bilbao (BIO) - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Bilbao International Airport (BIO): Approximate driving time is 20 minutes and distance is 20 kilometres (12.5 miles).

Taxis are available at the airport and Bizbaibus buses run every 30 minutes from the airport to Bilbao Plaza Moyua. Regular trains run from Bilbao-Abando to Santurtzi railway station which is 100 metres from the hotel.

Driving directions: When driving from the airport, take the highway in the direction of Bilbao, and follow signs to Santander. Take the exit marked Portugalete-Ortuella and turn right at the sixth set of traffic lights. Turn left and the hotel is 200 metres along on the right.

Bilbao has a good metro, many buses and a light rail system; you can also cover most of the city easily on foot.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
